name: TransactV3PendingToStuckInProcessingTests

testStage.description: Transact V3 Pending To Stuck In Processing test

steps.name: Transact V3 Pending To Stuck In Processing Ok
Action Test Step 1 : Set Vendor simulator to fail (MTNNG EXCEPTION)
Action Test Step 2 : Wait 5 seconds for simulator to run
Action Test Step 3 : Execute Financial Terms Calculate REST Request
Action Test Step 4 : Execute Transact V3 REST Request
Action Test Step 5 : Set Vendor simulator to SUCCESS
